title: BoB loan book grows 8% in Q1; IndusInd's net advances up 16%
description: The bank's CASA ratio fell to 36.7% at the end of June 2024 from 39.9% a year ago, disclosures made by the bank showed. Retail deposits and deposits from small business customers amounted to ₹1.74 lakh crore as of June 2024, up from ₹1.69 lakh crore in March 2024, the bank said.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
